font-face
  1. have your font file (find cool and free ones at dafont)
  2. generate webfont at fontsquirrel
  3. move resulting webfonts to assets/fonts
  4. font-face variable should match font filename (minus extensions)

typography snippets

word-wrap

forces text to flow

ellipsis

hides overflow text, adds "..."

hide-text

hide object text, visually only.

Made by Nicholas Frota, standing on the shoulder of Open Source giants.
